thread.title: Bollywood: Aamir Khan: I am not a box-office king
thread.title_full: Bollywood: Aamir Khan: I am not a box-office king - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bollywood: Aamir Khan: I am not a box-office king
text:
Bollywood superstar Aamir Khan who is still soaking in the success of latest release 'Dangal', says he doesn't think he rules the box-office. "I am not a box-office king. I am only Kiran's (his wife Kiran Rao) king," said the actor , who looked to be in the seventh heaven after the huge success of his latest film.
Aamir Khan and Deepika Padukone are No. 1 on Times Celebex Aamir Khan and Deepika Padukone take the top positions in Times Celebex powered by Zoom for the month of December 2016.
Speaking at the success party of the film on Saturday night, Aamir also added that he never chooses films on its potential to do business."Till today I never signed a film on the basis of its capability to do business. I prefer to choose a film from my heart. All the films I've done till now are those which touched my heart," he said.
"'Taare Zameen Par', '3 Idiots', 'Rang De Basanti' or 'Sarfarosh', when I did those films, I never thought they would do such a good business. If you take 'Dangal' as an example, I played a role of an aged and heavy wrestler. There are no romantic songs or any typical formula to become a blockbuster. Therefore, we never predicted that the film would be such a big hit," he added.
"I would never do films like 'Dhobi Ghat' with Kiran if I have ever thought of doing films by its number." Bollywood's Mr. Perfectionist told the reporters.
Asked if he wants to take forward the success internationally, Aamir said that for him the most respectable award is his audience's love. "Other than this, I do not think about any other awards."
Aamir also spoke about the recent attack of a mob on the 'Padmavati' set in Jaipur. Saying that the attack on Sanjay Leela Bhansali as 'unfortunate', the 51-year-old actor said: "Taking law in our own hand is not legal for anyone. What has happened is very wrong and saddening. The people of Rajasthan are very much lovable and sensible. My experience with the people and the place was very good."
"When a small group does this kind of an act, then the entire populattion gets a wrong name. This is very regrettable," he said.
Will Salman be able to break Aamir's ‘Dangal’ record? 00:49
Guess what B'wood stars are planning for New Year's eve? 1 30 Guess what B'wood stars are planning for New Year's eve? Bollywood actors Alia Bhatt and Sidharth Malhotra, who recently celebrated Christmas in Amsterdam, are also expected to welcome the New Year together. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Aamir Khan, who is basking in the appreciation coming his way for "Dangal", will travel to Panchgani with his family to bring in his wedding anniversary and the New Year. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Akshay Kumar will be celebrating New Year with his family and close pals in Cape Town. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Twinkle Khanna with her daughter Nitara in Cape Town. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Shilpa Shetty will be ringing the new year with her husband Raj Kundra and sister Shamita Shetty in London. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Bollywood's 'Sanju baba', who was released from Pune's Yerwada Central Jail as a free man, earlier this year, will travel out of India to celebrate the New Year with his family. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Radhika Apte, who is currently in London, will celebrate the New Year with musician husband Benedict Taylor. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? The newborn Taimur Ali Khan will have a gala time with his royal parents, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan at home. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Bollywood director Sidharth Malhotra will be partying with his family and closest friends at singer Shaan's Karjat farm house. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Director Sidharth Malhotra and singer Shaan having gala time with their friends at a party. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Superstar Mahesh Babu, who has taken a break from the shoot of his next yet-untitled multilingual film, will cherish New Year celebrations with wife Namrata Shirodkar and children in Switzerland (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? "Mahesh, his wife and children are currently in Zurich. Mahesh's sister Padmavathi too has accompanied them on this trip. They celebrated Christmas together. Mahesh is expected to return to India in the first week of January next year," a source told IANS. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Mahesh's wife Namrata Shirodkar has been sharing pictures from the trip on her Facebook page. In one of her posts, Quote: : "Christmas with family. Travel diaries. Zurich. Good times." (Photo Courtesy: Facebook) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? The Sri Lankan beauty Jacqueline Fernandez will be celebrating the New Year with her family at her hometown. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Singer Shibani Kashyap will be enthralling the crowd of 20,000 on New Year's eve in Dubai. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Priyanka Chopra is in India right now and the actress is set to ring in the New Year in Goa with her family and friends. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Priyanka, who has been busy filming the season two of her TV show "Quantico" in New York, is looking forward to spend quality time with her loved ones, according to The Hollywood Reporter. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Virat Kohli and Anusha Sharma will be celebrating the New Year in Uttarakhand. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Recently, Lovebirds Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli were spotted at Dehradun airport. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Director Shailesh Pandey will be taking out time from his busy schedule and will bring in the New Year with his family at his hometown Unnao. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Actress Yami Gautam, who hails from Chandigarh, will be busy shooting for films on New Year's eve. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Here's photo of Bollywood actress Yami Gautam holidaying in Austria. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Bipasha Basu will bring in the New Year with her huband Karan Singh Grover in Australia. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Check out this candid picture of Karan Singh Grover and Bipasha Basu from their vacation. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Karan Johar, who successfully concluded TV show Koffee with Karan season 5, will be welcoming 2017 in New York. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? This time Lisa Haydon will join her husband in Australia for New Year's celebrations. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Lisa Haydon enjoying with her friends. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Actor Prabhas will be busy shooting for "Baahubali: The Conclusion". (Photo Courtesy: Instagram) What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? A poster of Prabhas starrer movie Bahubali: The Conclusion. What are stars planning to do on New Year's Eve? Rapper Honey Singh, who is away from the limelight due to his bipolar disorder, is expected to celebrate the New Year with his family. (Photo Courtesy: Instagram)
